<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Add Compliance Requirement</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/compliance/{complianceId}/requirement"}></MethodEndpoint>



Adds a new compliance requirement to the provided compliance standard.

## Request
